text:
@GavinNewsom #coronavirus 

Fun Facts🎉 

🚨 CDC's May 1st report 🚨 

Deaths from February 1st through May 25th 👇

🚨 Pneumonia deaths👉  64,372

🚨 Covid-19 deaths 👉 37,308 

CDC has Covid-19 deaths reported 
at 37,308 from FEBRUARY 1st throught MAY 25th. 

NOT 60,000+

We were played🎉
